availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. Long (Christian County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, resident. Christian County, Kentucky, native. Son of Charles Long and Catharine Long. Married to Mary E. Boyd Long in Christian County, Kentucky, on December 20, 1857. Father of Mary C. Long, James S. Long, and Benjamin W. Long. Student in Christian County in 1850. Resident in Christian County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 481B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 567.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Hamby, p. 370A.
Kentucky Marriage Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994032, Christian County Marriages.
"John M. Long (1836-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial #99304942, accessed May 4, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/99304942.
